lines.text: Are we almost there?
We are getting close now, should just be a few minutes.
So this is suburbia huh? I didn't expect it to quite so... repetitive.
I know, great isn't it?
I guess so, just different to what I expected.
Suburbia has been rated the safest and happiest city 5 years running.
You're gonna love it here John, I just know it.
Thanks for giving me a ride Deborah, I'm sure I would have got lost.
Don't mention it! We are going to be neighbours after all.
Woah!
Did you see that?
See what?
That bush. It was all weird and looked like tv static!
Haha, you sure are a kidder John. What an imagination you have.
I'm serious! I've never seen anything like that before.
You're probably just seeing things.
It's been a big trip, and the stress of the new job is probably getting to you.
Yeah... you're probably right. Bushes don't tend to look like that.
Ahhh!
It happened again!
Did you see th-
No. Nothing happened.
I swear it, turn around and I'll show yo-
NOTHING HAPPENED.
Deborah?
Yo.
What was that?
What was what?
Uh... Nevermind, I think im just tired.
Well you'll be able to have a nap soon.
Your new house is this one on the left. Welcome Home!
